publications: [{"title":"ByteCar: A Decentralized Cloud Network","subtitle":"researchgate","date":"March 1, 2024","description":"ByteCar presents a novel approach to decentralized storage by repurposing conventional cars into storage nodes, utilizing surplus energy for operation.
